name: SOLARE | Bata V.0.5
description:
This is a work in progress game! For the first 1-7 levels the game works but after that it doesn't. There is a problem in scratch. Make sure to press the see inside. And then press all of the spites, because it will load them in to make it work, Sorry its not me its scratch.

Remember this a beta so if you find a bug just comment the bug and I will try to fix it. Press play to begin. Use the arrow keys to move your character. Go to the green line to pass to the next level. There will be spells on the ground go and pick them up. When you find a wall block use your spell to break it.

Background music by Soundimage.org great music there I recommend going there.

intended for the game jam "A cosmic quarantine" go there to find more awesome projects!

Find more of me at Itch.io
